(Oooh, no, Zardus will have to deal with the big update all by HIMSELF)



Pyro/Scavenger/Hiss/Demon Wulf/Dark Claw/Flesh Riper/Minion/Chaos:




Pyro's tank mode takes the missile, a large dent in his side.  He fired off 
three fire balls at Jetstorm.

---

Scavenger fires off 25 explosive rounds from his automatic rifle at Jetstorm.

---

Hiss fires off three fusion blasts from his cannon at Sharpedge.

---

Chaos rolls out of the way of the laser blasts, raising his rifle and firing 
off three bolts at Jetstorm.

---

Minion stumbles back from the optic blasts, firing off 10 rapid optic blasts 
at Sharpedge.

---

Demon Wulf takes a step back as the missile explodes against his chest. 
Growling in rage, he raises his left palm, a glob of red glue launching out 
at Jetstorm's optic sensor.

---

Flesh Ripper fired off three laser bolts from his rifle and 25 rapid optic 
blasts at Sharpedge.

---

Dark Claw formed two small orbs in his hands, throwing both orbs at Jetstorm.
"DIE!"
